footerDisplay: For additional settings or help visit [eDomoticz](https://github.com/PatchworkBoy/homebridge-edomoticz) or [Domoticz forum thread](https://www.domoticz.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=36&t=10272).

server.title: Server
server.description: If Domoticz is set up to use basic or form login authentication, set Server to 'user:pass@ipadress'.

roomid.title: Room ID
roomid.description: If Room ID is set to 0, homebridge loads ALL sensors. Note that Room ID is domoticz roomplanâ€™s idx number.

mqtt.title: MQTT
mqtt.description: By default, the plugin will grab hardware information regarding MQTT from Domoticz if mqtt is true. Advanced users can override their MQTT.

ssl.title: SSL
ssl.description: Set SSL to true to turn on SSL. You will need to specify your SSL port - usually Port 443 by default.
